text: Looney Tunes Cartoons is an American animated television series. It was developed by Peter Browngardt. It was produced by Warner Bros. Animation. It is based on the characters from Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies. The series made its worldwide debut at the Annecy International Animated Film Festival on June 10, 2019, and premiered on HBO Max on May 27, 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Looney Tunes Cartoons on HBO Max * Category:2020s American animated television series Category:2020s American children's television series Category:2020s American comedy television series Category:2020 American television series debuts Category:Looney Tunes Category:English-language television programs Category:HBO Max original programming Category:Cartoon Network series Category:Television shows about rabbits and hares Category:United States in fiction
title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
